Colin D'Amelio

Web Developer & Designer

{ Hi, my name is Colin.

I am a Toronto based front-end web developer. I am always striving to level up and allow my skills to construct creative, aesthetic, and powerful websites.

I come from a more academic-oriented background (B.A. & M.A.). However, web development has opened the door to a more creative and tangible experience.

When I am not building custom websites, I can be found volunteering for a non-profit organization with a mandate towards community safety.

}

What I can Do

Programming

HTML5, CSS3/SASS, WordPress Javascript and jQuery supply the needed tools to build and maintain beautiful and modern websites.

Responsive Design

Providing a seamless transition across a wide range of devices to ensure optimal viewing experiences.

Soft-Skills

My professional and educational background contribute to my abilty to perform above expectations, deliver proven products and lead.
